Package com.bytedesk.core.email

Class EmailListenerController

java.lang.Object
com.bytedesk.core.email.EmailListenerController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/email/listeners") public class EmailListenerController extends Object
邮件监听管理控制器 提供监听状态查询和管理接口
